name: Buggy Friend <3
description:
Hey! <3

Here's a friend to spread love and get you through your day.

Simple intructions - use the arrow keys to walk over to the heart and bump into it to speak to the buggy friend. Buggy friend has many things to say.

I'll add more to the speeches in the future if wanted.

MADE WITH BITSY https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

MUSIC BY LIAMAPARSONS https://soundcloud.com/liamaparsons/you-cant-think-about-it-always
